attributes.action: National Health Care & Dignity for the Elderly
attributes.additional_details: We call on the Government to lead the way to ensure first class health,social care and dignity for the elderly. To respect them as they would wish to be respected and treated.  That Social Care and Health Care  meets the Standard expected of a modern Country. To stop discrimination in all areas of society against the elderly and to support their Human Right to quality of life. To promote a campaign showing their support instead of saying it is unaffordable, which is causing most of the problems in the present system. The Country is lead by the Government and we call on them to act now.
